Activity: Log in, check emails. Read some articles on project management methodologies.
Confirm receipt of proposals from EHR vendors who intend to bid. Follow up with any vendors who have not yet responded.
Schedule a meeting with the evaluation team (@itpm-1, @da-1, @clinlead-1, @his-1) to discuss the process for evaluating the vendor proposals. Topic: Vendor Proposal Evaluation Process
Refine the scoring matrix based on the received scoring matrix feedback.
Lunch Break - Pizza Friday with colleagues!
Host a kick-off meeting with the evaluation team. Review the evaluation criteria, scoring matrix, and timelines. Distribute the vendor proposals to the team members.
Begin initial review of vendor proposals, focusing on key criteria such as functionality, integration capabilities, and pricing. Highlight any areas of concern.
Wrap up the week by organizing notes and action items. Prepare a brief summary of the week's activities for the team.
